author: Zolan Kanno-Youngs
title: Inside the NYPD Special Victims Unit: Victims Tell Their Stories
text:
In October, Alison Turkos reported to the New York Police Department that she had been raped on her way home from a bar in the Crown Heights neighborhood of Brooklyn. In the seven months since, she says she has struggled to get response from a Special Victims Division detective.
“I can’t get my detective to answer my email or return my calls,” Ms. Turkos told a panel of police officials and advocates in Brooklyn last month. “How can you can tell us to report when we can’t get you to do your jobs?”
...
